Very thankful for the lessons learned.”</p></p><h4 class="dynamic" data-field-id="166e46">Customer Service Training Workshop Participant</h4><h6 class="dynamic" data-field-id="pwbfxw">A&E Networks</h6></div></div><div class="repeater-item swiper-slide"><div class="content-wrapper middle center"><p class="dynamic" data-field-id="e20bbf"><p>“Thomas Farley’s facilitation of the storytelling module was very engaging and effective. It was super valuable and relevant, as you can probably tell by the robust discussion from everyone.”</p></p><h4 class="dynamic" data-field-id="166e46">Time Management Training Course Participant</h4><h6 class="dynamic" data-field-id="pwbfxw">Meta</h6></div></div><div class="repeater-item swiper-slide"><div class="content-wrapper middle center"><p class="dynamic" data-field-id="e20bbf"><p>“Stefanie was a joy to work with, and our group really had a great time learning, laughing, and growing in our relationship to one another. data.text:
Business Training Works
We help people do their work better
INSPIRE . ENERGIZE . LEARN
Let’s Start a Conversation
At Business Training Works, we’re here to help you tackle workplace challenges with practical solutions and engaging learning experiences.
Our mission is simple: to help people do their work better.
We offer meaningful programs that spark ideas, energize teams, and foster learning. Explore our site to discover how we can support your organization’s growth with training and tools that make a difference.
Whether you want to enhance communication, leadership, teamwork, customer service, sales, or something else, we are here to help.
Too much to review? Get in touch to cut through the noise and start a conversation.
[Get in Touch](https://www.businesstrainingworks.com/contact/)
Onsite Training Workshops
Engaging in-person learning
Virtual Training Programs
Convenient solutions for remote teams
Self-Paced Online Courses
Flexible learning that fits your schedule
Executive Coaching
One-on-one sessions to refine skills
Keynotes
Inspiring presentations for conferences and events
Facilitation
Professional guidance for productive meetings and discussions
Latest Course
Latest Resource
Our Business Training Services
We Can Help
Explore Our Diverse Training Workshops and Courses
[Business Etiquette](/business-etiquette)[Business Writing](/business-writing)[Change Management](/change-management/)[Communication Skills](/communication-skills/)[Conflict Resolution](/conflict-resolution/)[Cross-Cultural Communication](/cross-cultural/)[Customer Service](/customer-service/)[Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion](/diversity-and-inclus/)[Facilitation](/facilitation-skills-courses/)[Human Resources](/human-resources-training-courses/)[Leadership and Management](/leadership-and-management-courses/)[Negotiation](/negotiation-skill/)[Nonprofit Management](/nonprofit-management/)[Presentation Skills](/presentation-skill/)[Productivity and Self-Management](/productivity-and-sel/)[Project Managment](/project-management/)[Sales](/sales-training-courses/)[Storytelling](/storytelling/)[Team Building](/team-building/)[Thinking and Planning](/thinking-planning/)[Train the Trainer](/train-the-trainer/)
Discover How Our Solutions Work
Process
1
Explore Our Catalog
Browse our catalog to get a feel for our programs.
2
Chat with Us
Give us a call or drop us an email to discuss your needs.
3
Pick and Focus
Select your course and discuss areas of emphasis with your facilitator.
4
Schedule and Prepare
Set a date, invite participants, and get ready to engage.
What Our Clients Say About Us
“This training exceeded my expectations. Myla was very professional and knowledgeable when it came to the subject matter. She shared her own stories and experiences to bring the subject matter to life. It was a pleasure to learn from her.”
Facilitation Skills Training Workshop Participant
USF Health
“I found this topic highly relevant and different from many other typical course offerings. For example, instead of focusing on leading a remote workforce, Elizabeth’s course centered around engagement of the workforce with no focus on where they worked from. It is an outstanding class!”
Ownership Training Course Participant
USPTO
“I spent five years writing policy for the State of California. I wish California had made such a course available to me when I first started. As someone with experience writing policy, I found that the course provided useful information and helped me see policy writing concepts in new ways.”
Policy and Procedure Training Workshop Participant
US Dept of Labor
“The facilitator was absolutely OUTSTANDING! She is welcoming, engaging, and very easy to follow. She “screams” professionalism and confidence- in a very gentle way. As a person who is currently going through significant grief while working every day, this class was a Godsend. Mariana is a gifted facilitator. Because of her, I will be better at moving forward with purpose and helping my team to do the same! Thank you!
Driving Change Training Workshop Participant
US Navy
“Having been through other management training in the past, I must say this was the most engaging I have done. Thank you, Elizabeth!”
Management Training Course Participant
Thrive Alabama
“Myla has a great personality and is very knowledgeable about this course. She has an answer for every question. Myla is great and has a lot of experience in sales.”
